TikitButton.class: w-auto h-9 rounded-md bg-gray-500 ios:bg-selected-black/10 touch-feedback

Icon.class: w-8 h-9 ml-0 text-lg text-center touch-enabled-false text-white/90 fa fa-check-circle

Label.class: font-regular w-auto h-9 vertical-align-top ml-8 mr-2 text-lg text-left touch-enabled-false text-white/90
